questionTitle: When I stopped talking,Sam finished my sentence for me as though he  _______ my mind.
If you _______ , I would have brought my friends over to your house this evening to watch T.V,but I didn't want to bother you.
I wish I _______ you some money for your rent,but I'm broke myself.
If someone  _______ in to the store,smile and say, "May I help you?"
"Here's my phone number"."Thanks.I'll give you a call if I  _______ some help tomorrow"
If I weren't working for an accounting firm, I _____ in a bank.
The deathrate would decrease if hygienic conditions  _______ improved.
The education in Japan _______ if the basic principles of education had not been taken into consideration.
If there _______ the ricefields could have been more productive.
the patient could not recover unless he  _______ an operation.
